items.description: No place on Earth is safe from plastic pollution. items.title: AI Can Help Limit the Spread of Misinformation During Natural Disaster, Study Finds
items.description: By the third day after the levees broke in August 2005, misinformation in New Orleans about lawlessness and looting was rampant. items.title: Human-Caused Global Warming Spiked the Death Toll of Europe’s Early Summer Heatwave
items.description: Human-caused global warming increased the peak temperatures of an early summer heatwave across much of Europe by up to 7 degrees Fahrenheit and tripled the number of expected heat deaths in 12 European cities, an international team of scientists reported Tuesday during an online press conference.
